page.title: 11TRANSPORT:HORSE RIDING
page.content: HORSE RIDING IN THE FLEET AREA IS VERY POPULAR. THERE ARE RIDING STABLES AT CHICKERELL VILLAGE AND SOME PEOPLE KEEP THEIR OWN HORSES AND PONIES. MANY PEOPLE BELONG TO RIDING CLUBS AND DO SHOW JUMPING OR CROSS COUNTRY RIDING. FROM CHICKERELL RIDERS GO TO BUCKLAND RIPERS. ALL THE HORSES AND PONIES HAVE TO BE WELL BEHAVED.MOST CHILDREN RIDE WELSH COBS, SHETLAND OR HIGHLAND PONIES. MANY HORSE RIDERS TAKE THEIR HORSES AND PONIES TO SPECIAL SHOWS CALLED GYMKHANAS AS WELL AS SHOW JUMPING THEY CAN ENTER GYMKHANA GAMES LIKE{BENDING, {FLAG RACE, CUP RACE, SACK RACE AND {APPLE BOBBING. TWO IMPORTANT PIECES OF RIDING EQUIPMENT ARE THE SADDLES AND BRIDLES.THERE ARE MANY TYPES OF SADDLES AND BRIDLES.
